project.name: RainMakr
project.description: The first all-in-one launchpad for AI agents, memes, and vetted IDOs on MegaETH.
project.longDescription: Rainmakr is the first all-in-one launchpad where you can build and swap intelligent AI agents and fun memes, plus jump into vetted IDOs with low FDV and quick vesting. It's a no-frills hub for crypto natives who want to mess with AI, memes, and early token plays on MegaETH. 100% fees to buyback $RAIN, 50% burn, 50% to stakers.

features.title: RainAI
features.description: AI Agents Launchpad with voice chat, autonomous yapping, and more.

features.title: RainPump
features.description: A fair-launch launchpad with doxxed token creators.

features.title: RainLaunch
features.description: The curated IDO for low FDV and quick vesting projects.

features.title: RainBoost
features.description: A quest to earn platform validated by social engagements.

features.title: RainDrop
features.description: A stakedrop hub for MegaETH community.

features.title: RainLabs
features.description: A community fund that invests in MegaETH ecosystem.

project.currentStatus: RainAI and RainPump are set for their Day 1 testnet launch. RainLaunch is scheduled for April, featuring the $RAIN testnet IDO and supporting partner projects on MegaETH. RainBoost, RainDrop, and RainLabs are in the pipeline for future release by mid April.

sections.title: Launch an AI Agent on RainAI

steps.title: Understanding RainAI
steps.content:
Our AI agents are built on a proprietary framework by the RainMakr team which integrates with OpenAI, Tavily, Perplexity, ElevenLabs, and more.

Phase 1 (current):
• Autonomous yapping
• Voice chat
• Text chat

Phase 2 (mainnet):
• VTuber functionality
• Livestream hosting
• Onchain asset management

Each AI agent linked to a token:
• Total supply: 1 billion
• Tied to a bonding curve

steps.title: Configure Your AI Agent
steps.content:
1. Visit the RainAI platform and click on Create AI Agent
2. Configure your token parameters (Agent profile picture, name, ticker, voice style)
3. Connect Socials (Twitter, Discord, Telegram, Website, etc)
4. Customize your AI Agent (bio, age group, answer style, personality, etc.). Be concise when prompting to ensure the AI aligns closely with your preferences
5. Click Create and Yalla, you have your AI Agent live on MegaETH.

steps.title: Interact with Your AI Agent
steps.content:
Once your AI Agent is launched, you can:
• Chat with them via voice (Start Agent Voice button)
• Chat via text
• Trade your token on the same page where you voice chat and text chat with the AI agent

sections.title: Create and Trade Memes on RainPump

steps.title: Understanding RainPump
steps.content:
RainPump prevents rugs by making sure that all created tokens are safe. Each token on RainPump is a fair-launch with doxxed creators. Every token is fixed at 1 billion supply.

How it Works:
1. Pick a token that you like
2. Buy the token on the bonding curve
3. Sell at any time to lock in your profits or losses
4. When enough people buy on the bonding curve it reaches a market cap of $69k
5. $12k of liquidity is then deposited in Uniswap and burned

steps.title: Launch Your Meme Token
steps.content:
Launch your meme through RainPump platform:

1. Visit the RainPump platform and click Start a new Token
2. Connect your Twitter
3. Configure your token parameters (name, ticker, description, picture)
4. Link to your Socials
5. Create Token

steps.title: Trade Your Meme Token
steps.content: Once your meme is launched, you can start trading immediately on RainPump. It's intuitive and needs no explanation.
